title: Not receiving level up capsules or chests?
body: I am currently level 29, and since level 24, and maybe 23, i haven't received any chests or capsules at all, whether from leveling up or any other means.

replies.body: After looking at your account history and XP gains, it seems like you were level 28 when the changes to leveling went live. Since then, you've leveled up to 29, and you did open that capsule which gave you a Warwick and Corki champ shard.
i see, i thought it had been much longer, sorry for the trouble
